title: 341. Q&AF: Dealing With Yes Men, Using Loans Vs. Using Savings & Asking For Help
itunes:title: 341. Q&AF: Dealing With Yes Men, Using Loans Vs. Using Savings & Asking For Help
description: In today's episode, Andy answers your questions on what's the best way to deal with yes men, whether it's a smarter option to take out a loan or use money from your savings when starting your business and why it's crucial to drop your ego when asking for help.
